==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|de|fr|machine||machine}}, from {{der|de|la|machina}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/maˈʃiːnə/}} * {{audio|de|De-Maschine.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Maschinen}} # [[machine]] # [[engine]] # {{lb|de|slightly|informal}} [[airplane]] # {{lb|de|colloquial}} [[motorcycle]] ====Usage notes==== * The word is not usual for vending machines and similar machines into which money is inserted (like a [[pinball]] machine or the like). These are called {{m|de|Automat|Automaten}}. ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|n}} ====Derived terms==== {{der3|de|{{l|de|Bohrmaschine|g=f||drill}} |{{l|de|Fräsmaschine|g=f||milling machine}} |{{l|de|Kaffeemaschine|g=f||coffee maker}} |{{l|de|Küchenmaschine|g=f||food processor}} |{{l|de|Maschinenraum|g=f||engine room}} |{{l|de|Spülmaschine|g=f||dishwasher}} |{{l|de|Waschmaschine|g=f||washing machine}} |{{l|de|Trockenmaschine|g=f}} |{{l|de|Schreibmaschine|g=f||typewriter}} |{{l|de|Suchmaschine|g=f||search engine}} }} ====Descendants==== {{top3}} * {{desc|hu|masina|bor=1}} * {{desc|be|машына|bor=1}} * {{desc|bg|машина|bor=1}} * {{desc|cs|mašina|bor=1}} * {{desc|mk|машина|bor=1}} * {{desc|lv|mašīna|bor=1}} * {{desc|lt|mašina|bor=1}} * {{desc|dsb|mašina|bor=1}} * {{desc|ro|mașină|bor=1}} {{q|also directly from French}} * {{desc|ru|машина|bor=1}} {{see desc}} * {{desc|sh|машина|bor=1}} / {{l|sh|mašina}} * {{desc|sk|mašina|bor=1}} * {{desc|sl|mašina|bor=1}} * {{desc|uk|машина|bor=1}} * {{desc|yi|מאַשין|bor=1}} {{bottom}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} {{topics|de|Aviation|Machines|Motorcycles}}
